params.instruction_str:
Look at these questions. Can you complete the sentences?

If you don't know or you're not sure which alternative is correct, you should study the unit(s) shown in English Grammar in Use.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: The television game show was not a success because audiences didn't think it was very _____ .
question.modelAnswerString: The television game show was not a success because audiences didn't think it was very interesting.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: Adam got a _____ in town. It really suits him.
question.modelAnswerString: Adam got a nice black leather jacket in town. It really suits him.

question.text:
'So you definitely won't come to the exhibition with us on Saturday?'
'No, not _____ you pay for my ticket.'
question.modelAnswerString: 'No. Not even if you pay for my ticket.'
